name: @pulse/desktop
author: Pulse

scripts.package: bun run build && bun run forge -- package && bash scripts/patch-macos.sh
scripts.package:linux: bun run build && bun run forge -- package --platform=linux --arch=x64
scripts.package:win: bun run build && bun run forge -- package --platform=win32 --arch=x64
scripts.package:mac: bun run build:native && bun run build && bun run forge -- package --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 && bash scripts/patch-macos.sh
scripts.package:all: bun run build && bun run forge -- package --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 && bash scripts/patch-macos.sh && bun run forge -- package --platform=linux --arch=x64 && bun run forge -- package --platform=win32 --arch=x64
scripts.make: bun run build && bun run forge -- make && bash scripts/patch-macos.sh
